meanings.sent1: She would preferably eat ice cream for dessert.
meanings.sent2: I would preferably sit by the window during the flight.
meanings.sent3: He danced around the room, preferably in his socks.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed preferably under the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The children played outside, preferably in the shade.

meanings.definition: If one had to choose; by preference
meanings.sent1: Preferably, I would choose the blue shirt over the red one.
meanings.sent2: We should preferably arrive early to secure good seats.
meanings.sent3: The cat would preferably nap on the softest pillow.
meanings.sent4: The birds chirped preferably in the early hours of the day.
meanings.sent5: The students should study for the test, preferably in a quiet room.
